name: Salty Wear Rabbit Island
description:
March Sale!  (regular 30.00 - 35.00 retail)

Salty Wear Hawaii

Making art and original photography a part of everyday life, we have brought together many of our favorite things, art, culture, family, lifestyle, health & fitness to create a clothing line that can be worn with pride and promote all of these things at once!  We know each image, where it was taken and the feeling we get from it. Art speaks to each person in a different way the same as fashion does, we use our favorite photographed images that we feel reflect the ideals of what Salty Wear is all about.

name: Makana Alii Blue Dry-fit
description:
Makana Alii paddle shirt.

Navy Blue with white screened logo on the front with small Hawaiian Islands on back.

Shirt is quality A4 brand.

** Note for Local Oahu Pickup in Kailua or Hawaii Kai please use "OAHU" in the coupon code. We will coordinate a pickup time by email.

name: Makana Alii Grey Tshirt
description:
Lightweight Athletic T with Makana Alii Logo on the front.

Available Logo Colors are White / Black/ Green

Current Sizes in stock Med & XL. Other sizing available soon.

** Note for Local Oahu Pickup in Kailua or Hawaii Kai please use "OAHU" in the coupon code. We will coordinate a pickup time by email.

Aloha.

name: Buddha Lips iPhone Case
description:
New iPhone cases, styling all that is hawaii. Slim profile design that fits great in your pocket. 

Hawaii Photographer and designer, Ramon Vrielink now uses iPhones as another canvas for his creative photography and graphics that is in local art galleries in Hawaii, and at www.saltywear.com

name: Vintage Aloha Bag - Blue
description:
Eke Aloha by Salty Wear Hawaii

Each bag is hand crafted from reclaimed Aloha Shirts. No two bags will ever be the same creating not only a wonderful functional tote but a true one of a kind fashion piece.  Aloha attire is given new life and purpose. Each shirt is lined with “hurricane tape” giving it both structure and durability. Once lined the transformation starts from a tired shirt to a hip and trend tote! Perfect for the Beach, Hula, Farmers markets, or just out and about. We always strive to keep our Aina in mind ~ Recycle, Reuse, Repurpose, Eke Aloha is the way to go!

description:

We always strive to keep our Aina in mind ~ Recycle, Reuse, Repurpose, Eke Aloha is the way to go!
